thread.title: Nike Air Force 1 Arrives in Bedazzled Floral Print
thread.title_full: Nike Air Force 1 Arrives in Bedazzled Floral Print

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Nike Air Force 1 Arrives in Bedazzled Floral Print
text:
Previous Next 
Lately, Nike has been blessing ‘heads with multiple colorways of the new SF-AF1 variant, but this time around, the Air Force 1 release is for the ladies. Accordingly, here we get a look at the upcoming “Palest Purple” low-top AF1. 
The classic sneaker is decked out in sequins across the upper, in turn highlighting a bedazzled floral motif. A translucent sole then draws attention to the bottom of the sneaker, as the injected unit doubles as an outsole for lightweight comfort. 
The “Palest Purple” Air Force 1 ($200) will be available from February 23 at 10 a.m. EST.
